World Population Cartogram

A short post today. I saw this visual yesterday - a cartogram of the world population from Our World in Data.

From the post:

While a geographical map is helpful if you want to find your way around the world, a population cartogram is the representation that we need if we want to know where our fellow humans are at home.

Itâ€™s a powerful visual that puts a lot into perspective. A very quick analysis of the top 15 most populous countries and how they rank in terms of nominal GDP (source).

Country Rank in Population Rank in GDP
China 1 2
India 2 7
United States 3 1
Indonesia 4 16
Brazil 5 9
Pakistan 6 41
Nigeria 7 31
Bangladesh 8 43
Russia 9 11
Mexico 10 15
Japan 11 3
Ethiopia 12 (unranked)
Philippines 13 39
Vietnam 14 49
Egypt 15 45

I use this space to write everyday - to clarify my thoughts, learn through writing, and sometimes just journal and post things I find interesting.
